(M3 alatet 6 db)
(cmd line: -i M3x6_alatet_6db.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i M3x6_alatet_6db.txt -t -p)

(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d2 h19

yxz

s50
f700

safetop0.5
safebottom0.5
# fúró-maró
overcut0.878
# maró

pre_mill_steps2


#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm

#emax0.01   #2:13

fmax900
fmin450
fratio0.8

(mélység)
th = 2
(belső átmérő)
db = 3
(külső átmérő)
dk = sum(7,2,2)
print "dk: $dk"

c = 0.1
c2 = 0.05
j1 = 0.1
gw = 0.3
gh = 2

(h 4,4 d7.5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)
(h 4,4 d5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)

x = div($dk,2)
y = div($dk,2)
o = add($dk,3)

(1.sor)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c2 jg$j1 m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,$gw,$gh np m1
